sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均可表示"变成，成为"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: become, get, grow, turn, go, come
means: become ： 最普通用词，作为连系动词，指从一个状态向另一个状态的变化。
get ： 常指某人或某物有意无意地获得引起变化的因素，结果使变成另一状态。
grow ： 常指逐渐地变成新状态，强调渐变的过程。
turn ： 侧重指变得与原来截然不同，有时含贬义。
go ： 作为连系动词，通常与形容词连用，指进入某种状态，从而发生变化，多指不好的状态。
come ： 侧重变化的经过或过程，多用于不良情况。

sentence.Network_en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentence.Network_en: I denied my father because I wanted to become someone else.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和父亲断绝了关系，因为我想成为一个不一样的自己。

sentence.Network_en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 为字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 治理〖 administer〗 变成,成为〖 become〗 是〖 be〗.
为字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 治理〖 administer〗 变成,成为〖 become〗 是〖 be〗.

英语不规则动词表(附音标)测试卷 - 豆丁网 ... beaten 打败 3. become 变 come 来.

list.abs: 雅思词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... beautician n. 美容师 become of (命运等)降临; 使遭遇 beforehand ad. 预先,事先.
ritazj的单词本 - 我的n词酷 ... 犹豫 hesitant 见效 become effective 牙膏 pasta de dientes.
Carattere « 和 » - Dizionario di Sinogrammi ... 柔和[ soft;gentle;mild] 失和[ become estranged] 婉和[ mild].
due的具体用法，谢谢各位！！_百度知道 ... [古、诗]当然 fall due 到期, 满期 become due 到期, 满期 for a full due.

jx.jx_en_mean: To be the fate of; happen to

lj.lj_ly: What has become of the old garden?
lj.lj_ls: 这座古老的花园变成什么样子了?

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  becuman 'come to a place, come (to be or do something') (see be-, come),of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bekomen and German bekommen 'get, receive'

entry.def: If someone or something becomes a particular thing, they start to change and develop into that thing, or start to develop the characteristics mentioned.

example.ex: I first became interested in Islam while I was doing my nursing training...
example.tran: 我在接受护理培训的时候开始对伊斯兰教产生了兴趣。

example.ex: The cocoa industry dwindled because it became increasingly difficult to cover costs...
example.tran: 由于越来越难以收回成本，可可产业日渐衰落。

entry.def: If something becomes someone, it makes them look attractive or it seems right for them.

example.ex: Don't be crude tonight, Bernard, it doesn't  become you.
example.tran: 今晚别说荤话，伯纳德，说荤话可不好。

entry.def: If you wonder what has become of someone or something, you wonder where they are and what has happened to them.

example.ex: She thought constantly about her family; she might never know what had become of them...
example.tran: 她一直挂念着家人；她也许再也听不到他们的消息了。

example.ex: Where will he go to school now he's been thrown out of Eton? What will become of him?
example.tran: 现在他被伊顿公学开除了，他去哪儿上学呢？他将来又会怎样呢？

means.word_mean: 1. enter or assume a certain state or condition;

sentences.sentence: "He became annoyed when he heard the bad news"
"Her former friend became her worst enemy"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 构成动词,表示"使……成为"; 2. "饰以……"或加强

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使安静, 因无风而使停航
stems_affixes.word_buile: be使……成为+calm平静的→v.使安静, 因无风而使停航
be使……成为+come来→使来临,到达→成为→适合

sentences.cn: 琼斯先生去年当了校长。

jushi.english: The custom has now become a rule.
jushi.chinese: 那种习惯现已变为成规。

jushi.english: Later I became a railway worker.
jushi.chinese: 后来,我就当了铁路工人。

jushi.english: The battlefield became their training ground.
jushi.chinese: 战场成了他们的练兵场。
